name: arrayMap
description: Iterates over every entry of the array and calls the closure function to work on the element of the array. The returned value will be set at the same index in a new array and the new array will be returned

links.title: Map, Reduce and other Higher Order Functions
links.description: A Primer for map, reduce, filter, and Higher Order Functions in general.

links.title: ColdFusion 11: .map() and .reduce()
links.description: A look at the new .map() and .reduce() methods that each of array, struct and lists all have

links.title: arrayMap(): a reverse CFML history
links.description: A history of custom implementations of map prior to CF11

params.description:
Closure or a function reference that will be called for each of the iteration. The arguments passed to the callback are

item: item in the array
index: index of the array
array: a reference of the original arrray
params.name: function

examples.title: Script Syntax
